summary: Internal FBI email from Public Affairs Specialist Amy J. Thoreson to an unnamed recipient regarding media inquiries about Ghislaine Maxwell. The email indicates media outlets were calling to say they were hearing the FBI had 'found' Maxwell.

persons.name: Amy J. Thoreson
persons.context: FBI Public Affairs Specialist in New York who sent an email about media inquiries regarding Ghislaine Maxwell.

persons.name: Ghislaine Maxwell
persons.context: Media outlets were calling the FBI to say they were hearing the FBI had 'found' Maxwell.

connections.description: Thoreson, as an FBI Public Affairs Specialist, is handling media inquiries related to the investigation and reported location of Ghislaine Maxwell.

events.title: Media inquiry about Ghislaine Maxwell
events.description: Media outlets contacted the FBI New York office to say they were hearing the FBI had 'found' Ghislaine Maxwell.

keyFacts: On October 8, 2019, media outlets contacted the FBI New York office regarding Ghislaine Maxwell.
The media inquiry suggested that outlets were hearing the FBI had 'found' Maxwell.
The communication is an internal FBI email from Public Affairs Specialist Amy J. Thoreson.
